p: Cells in maintenance media [ 8] were plated on 96-well cell culture plates (Corning, Flintshire, UK), inoculated with the viral stock, and incubated either at 15, 20 or 25 Â°C for up to 14 days for the observation of CPEs. The viral titer, measured as the median tissue culture infectious dose (TCID 50), was calculated, as described before [ 27].
